Class Project

java.lang.Object
Project
public class Project extends Object
The class contains the data and attributes of a building project. This class is dependent of the Person class as you cannot create a project class without a person class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String projectNumber, String name, String buildingType, String address, String erfNumber, float totalProjectFees, float amountPaidToDate, String deadline, Person contractor, Person architect, Person customer)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      projectNumber - Unique number of project
      name - Name of project
      buildingType - Type of building
      address - Address of project
      erfNumber - ERF Number of project
      totalProjectFees - Total cost of project
      amountPaidToDate - Total already paid for project
      deadline - Deadline for project
      architect - Architect for the project
      contractor - Contractor for the project
      customer - Customer of the project
